author: matkt0
content: When I run lodestar quickstart I see `--networkid 69421`  `--override.prague=1706865900`  in the logs but If I check the genesis file https://config.verkle-gen-devnet-3.ethpandaops.io/el/genesis.json it's `"pragueTime": 1706866200`  I have some peering issues with my Besu node and it could be the reason. what is the value I need to use ?
